summary: Build and publish an Internet Computer app named Pasar Digital Community (Pasar Digital) with vehicle registration/status checking and ownership management; current focus includes enabling installable PWA support for Android/iOS and ensuring the favicon uses the Pasar Digital logo.
architectural_notes: Target delivery as an installable Progressive Web App (PWA) with proper manifest/service worker support for Android and iOS.
Branding requirement: favicon must use the Pasar Digital logo.
known_issues: PWA installability is not currently working/implemented as expected (user reports app is not yet a PWA).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Browser favicon using the Pasar Digital logo (favicon.dim_32x32.png)
- Browser favicon using the Pasar Digital logo (favicon.dim_16x16.png)
- Apple touch icon using the Pasar Digital logo (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
- PWA app icon using the Pasar Digital logo (pwa-icon.dim_192x192.png)
- PWA app icon using the Pasar Digital logo (pwa-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Maskable PWA icon using the Pasar Digital logo (pwa-maskable.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Make the frontend fully installable as a Progressive Web App (PWA) on Android and iOS by ensuring the service worker is registered in the app and that the manifest + app icons are correctly served from the frontend static assets.
Update PWA metadata so that the favicon and platform icons use the Pasar Digital logo consistently, including browser favicon(s), Apple touch icon, and manifest icons.
Add a minimal verification checklist (documented in CHANGELOG.md) for PWA installability covering Android Chrome and iOS Safari, without changing existing feature behavior.

new_feature_requests.summary: Enable installable PWA (Android/iOS) for the web app and set the favicon to the Pasar Digital logo.
